name: Railway Empire - Crossing the Andes
description:
<h3>Feature List</h3><p>• 3 new scenarios covering the early history of railway pioneers in the Andes.
• Map expansion: South America region (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
• More than 10 new goods including llama wool and guano, and 34 new cities to discover
• New engines: Kitson-Meyer (0-8-6-0) and Garratt (2-6-0-0-6-2)
• Explore the world of Railway Empire in the night mode</p><br/><h3>About the Game</h3>Take on new journeys in the depths of South America in the early 20th century, where a hoard of exotic new resources are ripe for the picking and plans for crossing the Andes by train are drawing attention from investors far and wide. Unforgiving mountains and relentless jungle terrains will make this challenge a tough one for even the most experienced tycoons.
